casebody.data:
Hilario LOPEZ, Appellant, v. LOSADA TRUCK AND EQUIPMENT, INC., Appellee. No. 75-864. District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. April 6, 1976.

April 6, 1976.

Brian R. Hersh, Miami, for appellant. Sheldon R. Rosenthal, Miami, for ap-pellee. Before PEARSON, HAVERFIELD and NATHAN, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed upon authority of the rule stated in Desandalo v. F & C Tractor & Equipment Co., Fla.App.1968, 211 So.2d 576, 580.
